title: Thread For Disputing Ban.
body:
Hello everyone. I am here to ask about information with regards to creating a support ticket to dispute a wrongful 2 week banning of my account. Ive been around since season 1 and have never once been suspended or banned. 

Can a moderator or admin from the tribunal take a look at the replay of my last game and see that the rest of my team was intentionally trolling me? The 2 week ban really isnt that big of a deal but come on.. seems kinda heavy handed to me, especially considering this is based off of one bad game out of thousands played with a completely clean record of conduct.

I'm 99% sure this post will amount to nothing but I know I'm innocent so I thought I may as well give it a shot, any help guys?

replies.body:
If you were given a 2 week ban right off the bat, it's likely because you used some form of hate speech or told someone to harm themselves/others. If you'd post your chat logs given in your reform card, we can help you identify what portion of your chat got you punished.

----
Edit: as others pointed out, if your van was for intentional feeding and you intentionally fed, it is unlikely to be removed.

----
Edit again, cause I was curious after seeing you complain about your teammates.

Given that your teammates do *all* appear to have been at best not trying, and at worst trolling the **entire** game, it's *possible* you get a pass on this time. I'd recommend submitting a support ticket and politely explaining that your entire team was doing similarly and while they didn't feed kills they intentionally threw the game and trolled.
looking for validation again i see...

You just send in the ticket. 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

You did something to get 14 day suspension. You're not really sharing what.
I just found out I lose my silver border reward now. I guess 4 premades can just ruin anybody they want with BOGUS reports. This is ridiculous.
1. you went 0/13/0 at 13 mins, you got banned for straight up inting... how is it bogus when you litterally inted
Update: I was unbanned, Thanks everyone for your replies
Look at my match history guys, im not a troller, Ugh i just want to play the game why does every second or third game i play have griefers in it?
0/13... stop whining you aren't going to get unbanned.

I did neither of those things, I was put in a 4 pre-made and they got mad that i called top first in champ select so they decided to follow me the whole game dance, taunt and do nothing, it was really frustrating, I tried to continue to play but just kept dying. then they told everyone to report me. How do i get the chat logs here?

Your match history says otherwise. You fed 13 kills at 13 minutes. With only boots and a pot. Please kid, don't int next time. It was justified and you haven't been playing since season 1 because you're taking ghost and ignite on garen.
